statements: SELECT * FROM composers ORDER BY composer_name ASC;
SELECT composer_name, nationality FROM composers WHERE birth_year > 1800;
SELECT major_works FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'Austrian' ORDER BY major_works ASC;
SELECT composer_name, birth_year FROM composers WHERE birth_year < 1700;
SELECT * FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'German' ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'German' ORDER BY birth_year DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT composer_name, major_works FROM composers WHERE birth_year > 1800 AND birth_year < 1900 ORDER BY composer_name ASC;
SELECT composer_name, birth_year FROM composers WHERE major_works LIKE '%Piano%' OR major_works LIKE '%Symphony%' ORDER BY birth_year ASC;
SELECT composer_name, nationality FROM composers WHERE birth_year < 1700 ORDER BY composer_name DESC;
SELECT composer_name, birth_year, nationality FROM composers WHERE composer_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY nationality ASC, birth_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM composers;
SELECT composer_name FROM composers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM major_works WHERE year_published > 1800 ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT composer_name, work_title FROM composers JOIN major_works ON composers.id = major_works.composer_id;
SELECT composer_name, COUNT(work_title) AS num_works FROM composers JOIN major_works ON composers.id = major_works.composer_id GROUP BY composer_name;
SELECT * FROM composers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT composer_name FROM composers WHERE composer_name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT composer_name, work_title FROM composers JOIN major_works ON composers.id = major_works.composer_id;
SELECT composer_name, work_title, year_published FROM composers JOIN major_works ON composers.id = major_works.composer_id WHERE year_published > 1800;
SELECT composer_name, COUNT(work_title) AS total_works FROM composers JOIN major_works ON composers.id = major_works.composer_id GROUP BY composer_name HAVING COUNT(work_title) > 2;
SELECT * FROM Composers;
SELECT composer_name, birth_year FROM Composers WHERE death_year IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM MajorWorks ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT composition_title, genre FROM Compositions WHERE genre = 'Classical';
SELECT composer_name, birth_year, death_year FROM Composers ORDER BY birth_year, death_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM Composers WHERE birth_year > 1800;
SELECT composer_name, birth_year FROM Composers WHERE death_year IS NULL ORDER BY birth_year DESC;
SELECT c.composer_name, w.work_title, c.birth_year, w.release_year FROM Composers c JOIN MajorWorks w ON c.composer_id = w.composer_id;

SELECT c.composer_name, w.work_title, cw.composition_title, cw.genre FROM Composers c JOIN MajorWorks w ON c.composer_id = w.composer_id JOIN Compositions cw ON w.work_id = cw.work_id WHERE w.release_year > 1800 ORDER BY c.composer_name, w.work_title DESC, cw.genre;

SELECT DISTINCT c.composer_name, COUNT(w.work_id) AS total_works FROM Composers c JOIN MajorWorks w ON c.composer_id = w.composer_id GROUP BY c.composer_name HAVING COUNT(w.work_id) > 2 ORDER BY total_works DESC;
SELECT * FROM composers;
SELECT composer_name, birth_year FROM composers WHERE death_year IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM works WHERE year_composed > 1800 ORDER BY year_composed DESC;
SELECT work_name, genre FROM works WHERE genre = 'Classical' LIMIT 5;
SELECT composer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_works FROM composers JOIN works ON composers.composer_id = works.composer_id GROUP BY composer_name ORDER BY total_works DESC;
SELECT * FROM composers;
SELECT work_name, composer_name, year_composed FROM works WHERE genre='Classical' ORDER BY year_composed DESC;
SELECT composer_id, COUNT(work_id) AS total_works FROM works GROUP BY composer_id HAVING COUNT(work_id) > 5;
SELECT performance_id, work_name, conductor_name, venue FROM performances JOIN works ON performances.work_id = works.work_id JOIN conductors ON performances.conductor_id = conductors.conductor_id;

SELECT conductor_name, birth_year, COUNT(performance_id) AS total_performances FROM conductors JOIN performances ON conductors.conductor_id = performances.conductor_id GROUP BY conductor_name ORDER BY total_performances DESC;
SELECT * FROM composers;
SELECT composer_name, nationality FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'German';
SELECT work_title, genre FROM works WHERE genre = 'Classical' ORDER BY work_title ASC;
SELECT composer_name, birth_date, death_date FROM composers WHERE death_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT work_title, composed_date FROM works WHERE composed_date >= '1800-01-01' AND composed_date <= '1900-12-31';
SELECT composer_name, nationality FROM composers;
SELECT work_title, genre FROM works ORDER BY composed_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre_name FROM genres;
SELECT composer_name, birth_date, death_date FROM composers WHERE nationality = 'Austrian';
SELECT work_title, composed_date, genre_name FROM works JOIN genres ON works.genre = genres.genre_name;
